Requirements Analysis.notes: All test requirements identified and documented from PRP 07-authentication-system-prp.md

Test Planning.notes: Test strategy and structure designed using Page Object Model and PRP methodology

Test Design.notes: Page Object Model framework implemented with BasePage, LoginPage, and DashboardPage classes

testResults.testName: Implement rate limiting for failed attempts

Test Evaluation.notes: Test execution analysis completed. 4/18 tests passing (22.2% coverage). Frontend application connectivity and UI element detection working correctly. Failures are expected due to backend authentication system not running. Test infrastructure and Page Object Model implementation are fully functional.

pageObjects: BasePage.ts - Abstract base class with common methods

testFixtures: testData.ts - Test users, credentials, and scenarios
testHelpers.ts - Common test operations and utilities
reporting.ts - PRP status tracking and reporting
configuration: playwright.config.ts - Playwright configuration with multiple browsers
